means: 对（自己的所为）感到懊悔或忏悔( repent的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Repenting of his crime the thief returned the jewels and confessed to the police.
sentence.Network_cn: 那贼对自己的罪行痛悔不已;归还了珠宝并向警方坦白.

PerfectNetExp.abs: repentance 证件, repenting 回心, repentant 有悔改表现的

list.abs: they repented staying out late .他们后悔在外面逗留得太晚了.
...e stem)。茎平卧地面生长，不能直立，如蒺藜、地锦草(Euphorbia humifusa)等。3.匍匐茎(repent stem)。茎平卧地面生长，但节上生不定根，如甘薯、蛇莓等。4.攀援茎(scandent stem)。茎上发出卷须、吸器等攀援器官，借此使植物攀附于它物上，如葡.
and if he sin against thee seven times in a day , and seven times in a day be converted unto thee , saying , I repent ; forgive him .4如果他一天七次得罪了你，而又七次转向你说：我后悔了，你也得宽恕他。
repent是什么意思... ... 1. repent: 后悔 | 懊悔 | 悔改 | 忏悔 2. repent of: 后悔 | 抱憾 3. Repent Forever: 终生遗憾.

entry.def: If you repent, you show or say that you are sorry for something wrong you have done.

example.ex: Those who refuse to repent, he said, will be punished...
example.tran: 那些拒不悔改的人，他说，将会受到惩罚。

example.ex: Did he repent of anything in his life?
example.tran: 他一生中有什么后悔的事情吗？

auth_sentence.content: They are also connected by a towering, surreal gasometer-castle, on which Leontes can be distantly seen praying and repenting.
auth_sentence.res_content: They are also connected by a towering, surreal gasometer-castle, on which Leontes can be distantly seen praying and repenting.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They are also connected by a towering, surreal gasometer-castle, on which Leontes can be distantly seen praying and repenting.

auth_sentence.content: Certainly, they damaged his sport by cheating: but they upset far more people in the sport by repenting.
auth_sentence.res_content: Certainly, they damaged his sport by cheating: but they upset far more people in the sport by repenting.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Certainly, they damaged his sport by cheating: but they upset far more people in the sport by repenting.
